Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide found in Pelophylax nigromaculatus
Literature.Author: Lu C, Liu L, Ma C, Di L, Chen T

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=700 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:LC50=>100 µM,Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:LC50=>100 µM
